author: mindbridge
msg: Adding Javassist license

author: mindbridge
msg: Unit tests for the following features:
- javassist enhancement code
- parameter default value
- template tag
- Any changes

author: mindbridge
msg: Adding:
- the ability to define default values of parameter, and as a consequence
of that, making 'auto' parameters not necessarily required.
- a standard predefined parameter 'templateTag' that is bound to the
HTML tag used to insert the component in its parent's template
(or null if the parent does not have a template)
- a modification of the Any component that uses the above two features.
The 'element' parameter of Any is no longer required -- the component
by default now generates the same tag with which it is inserted into
the template. for example, you can now do:
<td jwcid="@Any" colspan="ognl:colspan">

author: mindbridge
msg: Switching the enhancement code to using Javassist instead of BCEL.
As a part of that, providing a standard interface that allows easy use of
different mechanisms for enhancement of the code.

author: mindbridge
msg: Removed the reference to InsertRenderer.
This component has never actually been checked into Contrib --
use the Delegator component in the framework instead.
